question: Which of the following schemes was launched in Odisha with an aim of providing pension to old age, widows and handicapped?
explanation: Madhubabu Pension Yojana was started in the year 2008. Its main objective was providing pension to widows, old age, and handicapped. Rs. 300 per month for above 60 years of age, Rs. 500 per month for above 80 years of age.
